name: Brian Hirsch
text: Great value, Fresh Salads and good pizza, Best bang for the buck.

name: Rochelle Thompson
text: First time eating here. It's very inexpensive and u can have as much as u want. This spot has salad pasta pizza cinnabons, etc! My son liked it as well. The girl who checked us in was sweet. There were 85 kids leaving when we were walking in. I hope they liked it because me my son my man left happy. And also they have an arcade area.

name: Sharmicka Hicks
text: The food was good and hot. The customer service I recieved from the manager terrance was absolutely amazing!!! Thank you for supporting us on veteran's day.

name: tlao coyani
text: Great pizza spot. Kids loved it. Restroom, parking lot, establishment all wheel chair accessibility. Neat paging service for those who "created" their pizza. Buffet of hot and ready favorites from plain to everything. Dessert and drink included (at this time).

name: Richard Poirier
text: The employees were very helpful and friendly thank you Naomi . It's was my first time eating here and I have to admit it was very good. The salad was great and the pizzas were hot and tasty.

name: Laurelinn Mead
text: First time here; friendly staff, good selection and surprisingly good pizza! We will definitely be returning in the future. 😀

name: Zebrayah Morrison
text: $6 without soda all you can eat pizza, pasta, soup, dessert and salad. Im a pizza lover it is hard to mess up pizza. They even let you order personal pizzas to order if needed. Also have option to order wings with different flavors. The play room needs more space and options but I go to eat not for kids to play.

name: alfredo ramos
text: I was disappointed at this place, it looks like it is in need of much cleaning and repairs. There was a soup spill on the counter and pasta on the floor for over an hour. Only the bus guy and the pizza maker were working. The other 7 to 8 …More

name: A. H.
text:
The pizza buffet is a great idea.. then you get there.  Nothing against the food or games. Even the employees are awesome.
Personally I don't like dealing with other people's children.  Granted the place …More

name: Angelique Leary
text: Very clean, fresh food, excellent customer service and those cinnamon rolls though! Just the best!! Definitely will go back again!

name: A. Havoc
text:
Service is awesome. The pizza is pizza.  That's hard to get wrong.  All you can eat.  At a good price.. sounds like a great idea.  Wouldn't mind going again.
Thanks again Cici.  Lunch was awesome.

name: Christy Jackson
text: Worst experience ever.  I put in a special order at 12:15 and watched others come in after me with special orders and were served before me.  This place is not busy and I am just now receiving my order at 1:20.  I  really feel I was treated differently from others, and management was no help.

name: Vanessa Diaz
text: 06/2/18 My family and I just left this place and I can't believe the kids they got working there r so unprofessional singing dancing yelling across the dining area the bus boy and his friend who cuts the pizza were being really childish I …More

name: Raychel Baker
text: I just love this cici's. They have quite possibly the friendliest staff I've seen! I came here with my pregnant friend who was craving dessert pizza. The sweet little chef not only whipped her up a fresh one but also came to the table to make sure it was perfect! Super impressed with their service.

name: ALEJANDRINA WIGGINS
text: The staff is always friendly the pizza is good for a buffet. Plus you can have a custom pizza made. They offer a veterans discount which is always nice.

name: C M
text: Your average Cici’s. People who come really don’t expect too much. Bathrooms could use a little more attention but the food, kid games, and service is great.

name: Angelique Vasseur
text: Friendly and attentive staff, very clean, and food is good. Kid friendly. If they don't have the pizza in buffet you want, ask and they'll male it.

name: Raul Y
text: I give 4 starts just because the pizzas.alreafy made were somewhat cold and also the soup... however... just ask, and they will make you a pizza, fresh from a start, and it is delicious, just have to wait for them to make it... and the deal that includes the drink, can't beat it... nice place

name: Heather Waggoner
text: I usually love cici's but this last time was a disappointment. Everything was not fresh or tasty, the bathrooms were not clean, the staff didn't smile or even engage with anyone. I don't know if I'll go back after this experience.

name: John Schmidt
text: This restaurant was very clean and the food was fresh. The staff were friendly and helpful.

name: Jorge Reyes
text: Totally underwhelming.   The commercials made it appear they had different types of pizzas but they only had 6.  For the value it was good.

name: Heidi Marie
text: The brownie and cinnamon roll were really soft and yummy. Pizza wasn't bad either and everything seemed fresh.

name: Tony Yee
text: This franchise does a good job with its buffet line and great service.  When busy it is nice to have a clean table to set my plates of pizza on less than $6 and the retro arcade is fun for all.  Bathrooms are clean which is not the case for most Cicis in town

name: Kevin Carver
text: Improved menu. Pizza was better than expected. Recommend ordering your personal pizza.

name: Michael Arbertha
text: Good thin crust pizza that's made the Way you like it.

name: Francisco Raposo
text: It's good for what it is: a low price pizza buffet. The food is Meh but for $5 all you can eat, I can't complain.

name: John Tomsich
text: This place was very disappointing. I have been to many other Cicis across the U.S. and the standards of this place are well below average. The staff was friendly, but the pizza was terrible and very low selection. There was either cheese …More

name: Lifehack Investigator
text: Kids love the place. For the price you can let loose your kids and their friends without breaking the bank. The only drawback is their gameroom - a BIG RIP OFF! Takes the kids coins and doesn't work-literally 90% of the time. You have to hunt the manager to fix it - if you can find him - goodluck!

name: mimic c
text: Bad experience. cashier was stoned and unable to work, no pizzas until after multiple people complained, chicken on the pizza was bad. Only one person actually did his job and didn't seem to be high on drugs

name: Miranda J Duval
text: I'm not very impressed with this place. The first time my kids wanted to come here I saw they had pizza and a salad bar so I figured it was going to be a win for everyone. The salad bar is very skimpy with very few options. They never have …More

name: Kathia Martinez
text: Love the pizza and salad bar .....clean happy employees greeted as you come in ....and a have a great day as you leave very welcoming and the brownies are yummy...

name: Andy Shreiar
text: Restaurant was dirty with food on the floor. There was not a good assortment of pizza on the buffet. Employees were rude and untrained.

name: Jay Cap
text: Great variety of pizzas.  All fresh and made to order also available.  Friendly staff and management.  5 Stars!!!

name: Ken Baker
text: Very good but was running low on some of the items on the buffet line.

name: Kutiepie Slotz
text: Hot and fresh. If you like a certain pizza, and you don't see it, you can order it no extra charge.

name: Maria Staton
text: My family love this Cici's pizza, but this time when we went in around 6 pm on a Tuesday and it just seemed that they didn't want to make any fresh pizza. Was not happy with the service.

name: Robert Castelan
text: Great pizza! Awesome service and you really can't beat the price. Definitely will come again 😀

name: Steve Palazuelos
text: The counter personal was friendly, and lemonade was good, but that is where I stop. The pizza was not cooked all the way and the salad seems like it is days old. The restaurant was kind of dirty. Would not recommend this place.

name: Ryan & Amanda Cook
text: Cinnamon rolls are awesome!!  It was fairly busy, so if you weren't standing in line when they set out a new pizza, you didn't get any.  There were only four kinds of pizzas out at any time.  The pasta was ok, the soup was just broth.  The …More

name: Whispers-Got-Ya ATD
text: I ordered carry out over the phone went smooth. I ordered the 3 med 1 topping for $12 and was told that price over the phone. When I got there there they tried to charge me extra for two of the pizzas I bought because they were thin crust …More

name: Rose Taber
text: The food was good. The desert was yummy. Everything was fresh. The staff was friendly, and needed to wash hands. Had his mouth guard in. It was hanging out of his mouth.

name: Michael schilling
text: Fresh pizza, nice workers highly recommend coming back here they even made me a custom pizza I thought was made to perfection

name: Terri Thorpe
text: Pasta was dried out in a warming tray and no sauces available.  There were 6 PIECES of pizza when we got there. Plenty of bread sticks. No meat lovers pizza...none being made. No sausage available.  Very, very disappointed. This was my first and last visit to this Las Vegas location.

name: WHITEBOY 39TH
text: Pizza was so good I think wings should be part of the buffet deal tho

name: Malanie adams
text: great deal for price. if you love pizza go their

name: Michael Artalejo
text: Sunday March 4, 2018 7pm. No salad. They are waiting for a manager to bring salad. Soda, they are filling people's cups from a 2 liter of coke. Waiting for ice. Finally put ice in the machine and people came running . 3 empty pizza trays. Extreme lack of urgency or caring .

name: Chris
text: Great food. Bathroom has been inoperable both times I visited.

name: Ashe Foxxo
text: For 6 dollars it is pretty great but this specific location has become very disgusting. The carpet+the weird wall in the middle itself still has so much crumbs, dust and other things I am not entirely sure of. The service also eliminated …More

name: Julian Martinez
text: Its..a good place..My kids 💟love it.BUT..PLEASE DON'T LET HIM FALL ..DOWN.

name: Yulian Suarez
text: Don't expect nothing great lol wasn't busy and they barely had food out. But you get what you pay for. Im not sure if the AC was off in the bathroom or what but it was hot and humid in there. Over all, the workers were nice

name: Keekee Badbih
text: Pizza and salad was great my babies enjoyed the small family environment great prices you can’t beat all u can eat for only 5.99

name: Stan Larson
text:
Pizza ordered was made wrong and had to be remade. 50% of their beverage machine was out of order due to no syrup in stock including Coke Classic, Sprite, Orange soda and Root beer!!
Worst experience ever at a CiCi's Pizza!

name: Courtney Eastepp
text: Came in on a Sunday around 1230. I expected a crowd, but there wasn't really any. This was my first time at this location as we are new to the area, but not new to Cicis. Highly disappointed. I never expect excellent quality here, it's …More

name: Tori Rivera
text: Love the food but they need more different kinds of pizzas

name: mindy cannizzo
text: Great staff, buffet style and just not Pizza, they have salad,soup, desserts and more.  Kids can play games tv more. Great place to have birthday parties for the family.  🍕🍕🍕

name: Blake Murphy
text: Absolutely the worst experience I have ever had at any buffet in my life. When we arrived there were no pizzas made, half the sodas were "out of order", and it took them about 10 minutes to even get our order for a custom pizza. The manager …More

name: Melissa Mendoza
text: Employees were professional, dropping pans of food, not paying too much to giests needs. We are not returning to that location any more, my family and i will be looking dor another cicis

name: Kenyatte K Havard
text: The atmosphere was nice and friendly however the cuisine was not agreeable to me due to health reasons.

name: Desiree Raygoza
text: The manager lady was so rude nd blew me off cuz she had things to do on the cash register first & they were out of so many items lile pasta coke stuffed crust they should tell people before then i wouldnt have spent my money their worst place ever

name: Joseph Browning
text: Really good place to have a salad and a slice. The staff was pleasant, especially a gentlemen named John who was very friendly and asked all customers if they needed anything.

name: Neda Cardenas
text: My family and I had a very pleasant dining experience today. There was plenty of pizza this time so the was no wait time.

name: Adam Kelley
text: It's Cici's. Best value than anyplace else. Lacking five stars due to the heat from the arcade room, children coming back sweaty. Also the confused looks when trying to pickup a personal request pizza.

name: David M
text: The best Cici's in town! Well worth the 85 mile drive. Come here once a week.

name: Samantha Greene
text: Better than little caesars, for about the same price you get all you can eat and dessert.

name: Hosia Towery
text: Wow, used to come here a couple times a month-arrived and it was empty. Very little pizza and out of brownies. Manager says they are done with making certain pizzas and brownies for the night @730? She wiped a couple tables them sat down at …More

name: Brandobomb 64
text: The pizza was old and dry.  They had two choices: pizza crackers or pizza jerky.  There were two pieces of stuffed crust that were out for more than an hour and when i asked about putting fresh pizza on the buffet they said they ran out. …More

name: Tia T
text: Food was good but 2 soda flavors were out and the counter with the lids and straws was sticky and soda spills everywhere.  Staff was nice.

name: Thomas Plaster
text: great atmosphere, good pizza,but my wife is gluten free and can't eat it. we tried the gluten free pizza and salad bar, but no good.

name: ashley love
text: If it wasnt for my kid i wouldnt come here...their pizza is always cold n the ppl that work here are always so rude....when u go to ask things they r quick to just brush you off and say will thats  what it is....

name: Patrick Rogers
text: Ordered several custom pizzas and none was right.

name: Denise Cyr
text: Slow service pizza was hot but they ran out of some pizzas.  Soup was empty and seemed dirty

name: Gabriel Robinson
text: Had a personal pizza with only 4 toppings and then at around 1030 am they didnt have all the deserts on the line yet so that sucked. I've been to better with all the deserts.

name: Tina Adams
text: Always great food and employees

name: Ms. Badu Phillips
text: A good place to stop for a quick lunch.

name: Enrique Martinez
text: Dirty not well maintained. In my honest opinion ofcourse.

name: Aryssa Gallardo
text: They have good pizza and desserts.

name: Skint007
text: Great price and quality.

name: Deivah John
text: I really like this place. The workers make it a mission to greet you, the food is good, and the arcade is small but it is kinda addicting.

name: Daniel Garcia
text: Cicis is always good , amazing  , awesome  , delicious  , thank you you guy's Rock the costumer service  always!!

name: Lashae Mino
text: I asked for a Flatbread Spinach Alfredo and they told me that they only had regular alfredo, which not thick and creamy like it is supposed to be, it was really liquid-y. They had no labels on the dressings, so you had to guess, they have …More

text: Love the food and prices, 2 star loss because it needs cleaned and updated.

text: Today I coming a 1:40 7/26/2017 I ordered one of my favorite pizza from them and it is 2:15 more then 30m waiting  and nothing

name: Charity Schneider
text: Pizza buffet. Great prices, decent food. Not very clean, difficult to eat with the kids since there is the arcade to distract them.

name: Guido Haesen
text: Great pizzas for a few bucks. Fresh and hot pizzas. All you can eat. Friendly staff

name: Vickie Kilgore
text: The price is great! This is better than Pizza Hut, good salad bar, great variety of pizzas & desserts!

name: Angel
text: Great place considering the price is only $5.99 for adults. A drink is an additional about $1.99. They had salad, soup, pasta with red or white sauce, about 5 different pizzas, a flatbread, cheese flatbread, cinnamon roll, and brownies. I'm …More

name: gabriela lawrence
text: Manager and employees are friendly, restaurant is always clean, and food is always fresh. Love this location!

name: Beauty room Exclusive
text: Love the food they have pastas and salad and once you pay you can get as much as you want. I really loved it

name: Brendan Inman
text: Place had no chicken at all for wings or pizza. Buffalo chicken pizza had ham/bacon instead of chicken. Only two drink were working, Coke and diet Coke. Nothing was said before purchasing meal.

text: Soup was refilled only 1/4 each time. How do you make pizza with no flavor. We use to like eating here but tonight is the last time I'm afraid.
